content:
This is set family combinatorics. It defines the slice of a set family and a stupid predicate for saying that all finsets in a set have size r.

MIght anybody review it? It's been rotting in the queue for a while (my fault for giving it imaginary dependencies...)
In a totally unrelated way, this also turns out to be useful for simplicial complexes. sized is more or less the condition for a simplicial complex to be pure.
